entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Renfrew
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:35 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:44 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 06:44 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 4.
